meta.title: VibeRise.me | Your Data, Your Power - Take Control of Your Digital Life
meta.description: Experience a new era of data ownership where you're in control. Own your data, protect your privacy, and get rewarded for your attention.

hero.title: Your Data, Your Power
hero.subtitle: Take control of your digital life
hero.description: Own your data, protect your privacy, and get rewarded for your attention

features.title: Raise the World's Vibe Together
features.subtitle: We believe that when everyone has control over their digital presence and data, consciousness rises and the world becomes a better place. Join us in creating this positive change.

main.title: Elevate Global Consciousness
main.description: Like blockchain revolutionized finance, we're revolutionizing how people interact with their data. When people have control, awareness rises and better things happen in the world.

community.title: Open Source Community
community.description: Join our open source community and help build the foundation for a more conscious digital world. Together we can create technology that serves humanity.

blockchain.title: Blockchain-Powered Future
blockchain.description: Utilizing blockchain technology to ensure true data ownership and transparency. Your digital presence, secured and controlled by you.

users.title: For Users
users.description: Take control of your digital presence, protect your privacy, and get rewarded for your contributions.

companies.title: For Companies
companies.description: Connect with conscious users who actively choose to engage with your brand.

investors.title: For Investors
investors.description: Be part of the revolution in digital consciousness and data ownership.

developers.title: For Developers
developers.description: Join our open source community and help build the future of digital interaction.

powerful.title: A New Era of Digital Control
powerful.description: At VibeRise.me, we believe your data should work for you. Wherever you go, whichever device you use, your digital life follows—secure, private, and in your control.
powerful.description2: Our AI assistant learns from you to assist you, without sending your habits or preferences to anyone else. Every insight it gains belongs to you.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your digital life follows—secure and in your control

rewards.title: Earn Rewards
rewards.description: Get paid for the ads you choose to see

validation.title: Ethical by Design
validation.description: Our open-source community ensures innovation thrives, and only partners who sign and follow our 'Matter of Principle' are allowed to integrate with us.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.subtitle: Your Data, Your Control
privacy.description: Complete control over your personal information and digital footprint.

ai.title: Smart Assistant
ai.subtitle: AI That Works For You
ai.description: Personalized assistance without compromising your privacy.

rewards.title: Get Rewarded
rewards.subtitle: Your Attention, Your Value
rewards.description: Choose your ads and get paid for your engagement.

comingSoon.title: SkillVal Coming soon
comingSoon.description: SkillVal is almost here! Be ready to validate skills and empower growth like never before.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe for updates
newsletter.description: Join our waitlist to receive updates about SkillVal
